--- CLIENT ---

You need to have steam running.
Use a fake account. You can create an account here: https://store.steampowered.com/join/?

To change game resolution, press SHIFT when launching the game executable.

run H2o.exe

Click Play. choose a server and play.
You can only connect to cracked servers.
You can find our server in the list: Kortal's Area - EU - PVP


--- SERVER ---

Download server files with anonymous steamcmd, appid: 377610

Copy all files from the "Oxide.vxxxx" directory to the main server folder.
Run once !start_server.bat, wait the config files creation, and close it.
Configure your server settings in the config.cfg

You can get plugins at http://oxidemod.org

Run !start_server.bat file to start the server.

Please note I don't give any support about server hosting.
